Name: King of Spies
About the game: “King of Spies” is a political spy-thriller visual novel and yuri dating sim. You play as Kelly Bond, a former USAF Intelligence Officer turned political espionage specialist. Infiltrate a rising political star’s campaign and discover their deepest secrets as your mission will decide the country’s fate forever! A gripping political espionage and romance storyline. Soothing contemporary jazz soundtrack Beautiful anime art Multiple endings
